title: Take care of yourself
creator_credit: John Dickinson & Co Ltd and British Information Services
brief_description: Two young people starting work in a paper works enact a series of accidents of the types common to most factories. The story points the moral that such accidents can be prevented by thought and care.
creator_credit_for_label: John Dickinson & Co Ltd and British Information Services
